name: Home Sweet Home (Demo)
description:
This giantess visual novel tells the story of a college student who returns home for the weekend only to mysteriously shrink to an inch tall. Now he has to  survive and  get help from his unaware stepmother Charlotte and her daughters, Gwen and Katey. 

Inspired by choose-your-own-adventure stories, it features branching paths as you try to navigate the dangers of shrunken life. Will he be saved or will he meet his end? That's up to you.

Character Art by widiaariawan 

Illustrations by dorian00, deztyle, and k_arrot

Background Art by syaviray

Music by David Fesliyan and Kevin MacLeod
